creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Willard Clark in celebration of the 100th anniversary of Minneapolis Institute of Arts
medium: Lacquer, hemp cloth, bamboo, gold powder, gold leaf, silver leaf, and shell (Turbo marmoratus)
text: Matsushima’s fascination with jewelry lead her to create large “body jewelry” seen here. Although it is meant to be worn, it is not a casual accessory and is, therefore, unlike traditional lacquerware.
title: Undercurrents 2009-II
